reviewText: This course does not offer certificate. Total time wasted.

I didn't find the lessons interesting, Peer-graded Assignments require to upload videos, and not everyone wants to upload it. So they post fake video from youtube. In addition, a very high score is required to pass and then, a battle begins between course colleagues to pass it. I found a colleague who gave the minimum of marks without motivation and we started failing the Peer-graded Assignment for 3 days. I didn't learn anything new and got nervous. Failed course
good
This course could be made more interactive and informative.

Don't know if the instructor was nervous or just not competent.  Pretty much useless if you have any type of training in publich speaking. 1 He speaks WAY TOO fast...and seems nervous and insecure2 No clear communication (which is funny as he is trying to teach you to communicate!) 3. Do not seem to understand the topic very well (typical Academia, who never actutally done any real work)

The course should provide less explanatory sessions and more practice-based tips. The videos are often repetitive and do not provide enough ground on theories of perception - i.e. how are we perceived while we do something when we speak?Mostly generic.
Great course !!!
Great course content!
Excellent course to brush up those skills and there are some inherent nuances shared by Dr. Matt which are highly practical and important.
An amazing course the teacher knows how to give an exciting class.. great!
Hola termine mi curso de forma exitosa,pero en la ultima semana aparece un comentario de que abandone,lo cual no es verdad si revisan mis trabajos y tareas están completas.Gracias.
Enjoyed doing the course. I think I have learned skills that will be very useful in future. It was good to engage in all the assignments as it really does help build confidence
Very useful.
I prefer fewer peer-review
w

Good course, particularly for informative speeches. I am doctoral student nearing by thesis proposal, so I was wondering - how the course will help me to structure my presentation. Though the course is helpful, but I would have loved little more treatment of such topics like presenting proposals, defense, data. This treatment is bit sketchy in the course. However, I will highly recommend the course to any doctoral student or anyone who wish to get into academia.
Very helpful for professional life.

It's an awesome course on the public speaking topic. I would recommend everyone to take this course. I have learned a lot from this course. The speaker is a charming personality and clears all the issues about public talk.
This is a course very interesting and good organizated with content  dynamic and clearly. This course help to the persons in the daily  and professional life.
I thank the staff and the teacher for providing me with a good basis on which to structure my future presentations

I would find it hard in the past to speak in a group or clearly communicate my ideas to people.  being part of this course on coursera has not just  helped put my words and thoghts together but has also given voice to my words.
Very Good Course
Awesome learning!
A great and fantastic exposure to communication, unlearning and relearning. very useful tips.
​the content of the course was super useful and helpful. Prof. Matt McGarrity was really really amazing
good
It's an interesnting course. I really like the skills that I learn here. so interesting
I enjoyed the course and learned a lot of information.
Excellent course.
Good speaker, good and clear topics
Thank you.

The Course is quiet informative and helps a lot in moulding confidence, sharpening public speaking skills: speech and written, and professionalism in the content we share with audiences. I have gained a lot to my expectation.
I really do enjoy public speaking. The lecturer is so entertaining yet helpful. Thank you very much for all those tips and tricks, I will 100 % come back.
It was amazing.

It was useful to continue learning and practicing,  after the first "Introduction to Public Speaking" course.I'm not convinced of why is left the choice between final speech or manuscript assignment.It is a speaking specialization, not writing. However, I enjoyed it!
muy completo hace la diferencia en este tipo de curso
Ok
Excellent course. I really gained a lot of new presentation skills and thoroughly enjoyed it.
I would totally recommend this course to everyone be it a beginner or an advanced speaker. Great Professor , great organizing of the modules and lectures.
el contenido es bueno, la información que manejan en verdad ayuda
Excellent course. Highly recommended...
Me encantó.
It's an excellent course. I learned a lot.

I have done quite a few courses about presentation skills, storytelling, public speaking and such on Coursera. This is the best one I found online. It is more theoritecal than the others but the course is complete and the teacher is great. The guy conveys his passion in a brilliant way. By following this specialisation, you will need everything you need to know to be good at public speaking.
This is my second course in public speaking with Matt. I love the way he teaches. I enjoy attending his courses. I strongly recommend his courses on Public speaking.
Es un curso muy fácil de comprender, te da herramientas necesarias para hablar en publico y te hace sentir mas segura de hacerlo
Estoy feliz de haber completado este curso.
Dr. Matt McGarrity, is an excellent lecturer and this course is a must have regardless of your field of study/expertise.
Great course
Dr. Matt is an excellent teacher, love the lessons and assignments!
One of my best learning experiences. Matt has worked extremely hard to create comprehensive content. Huge thanks to him for that. Happy learning!!
Excellent online training. The teacher is great. Very comfortable and reveals the key points of a good presentation. Thanks to the University of Washington
Excelente curso, das las bases necesarias para dar todo tipo de discursos, lo recomiendo
great course , nice materials provided. it is surely going to help me and all others who needs to explain and present things to others on daily basis as a part of their profession
Excellent course
Good
In my personal opinion it was excellent
I think it's a great course,an interesting one indeed.
I loved this course, I learned a lot and it helped me with my final thesis presentation, besides that I plan to put what I learned into practice in my work. Thank You!!
IT WAS A WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE OF BEING PART OF THIS COURSE ON SPEAKING TO INFORM. THE WHOLE CONTENT WAS IMPRESSIVE AND HELPFUL. THANKS A MILLION.
very nice course
I have learned how to make good spech . Thanks to coursera!
It was great

The course is very helpful. I can now speak in a simple, logical and understandable manner and learners/listener can now enjoy to listen to me and get value as well. Thank you Dr. Matt McGarrity. You are good at what you do. I will really have to finish thus course specialization.
Great course. Thanks a lot for all the important information.
I really loved this course. Thank you so much.
very good MOOC. with clear examples, good practical quizzes, and exercises. I did learn a lot
Muy bueno,  no me gusta hacer presentaciones en Ingles.. Pero ni modo gracias...
fortunate enough to have one
Excellent¡ I learned and practice several advice provided in this course.
GOOD
Excellent. Matt is good teacher ever!
Soooo good!!
excellent course
Great!
This is an excellent course of public speaking skills
Audited course, but learned a lot.  Great information, suggestions and examples.
I love this course.. I really learned a lot about public speaking.. Now I am ready to open myself on-stage because of this training.. ❤
Excellent
Very informative and practical course.Very interesting and well structured course for building confident in public speaking and exercises are very interesting to keep learner on track.
Perfectly designed course for taking you to the next level in public speaking. Immensely added to the knowledge on designing a speech for the audience.
Very helpful and beneficial

Really enjoyed this course. Very practical. Dr McGarrity is professional and has a passion for public speaking which he shares with his students. I especially learnt a lot about slides and visuals to accompany your speech. Will be able to use this information in the future.
Very challenging and interesting course!

I have learnt a lot from the teacher. Since he is a philosopher, he has got a lot af clarity in his explanations. Also, the summary at the end of each week is useful to retain some concepts. When it comes to the content, although I had some notions of communication and explanation, I learned a lot of techniques to make an argument easy to follow.
i love that
best course for personal development
Very good course, great teacher and interesting assignments.
Completed

This course was very informative. Lectures were recorded excellently. Respected Mr. Matt McGarrity  Expressed his Good will and full knowledge about the course. I would recommend this course for anyone who wants to up their speaking Game.
I like this course so much. I like the way Dr. Matt McGarrity encourage and teach everybody to overcome the fear of public speech.
Very interesting and practical course.
Excellent lecture structure.  The logical progression of the lessons made it easier to understand and grasp the key concepts of the course.  I would recommend this course to everyone.
Great course, excellent structure and content, the exercises help to fixate and practice the learning's.

This course taught me so much and helped me and my students, who are professors in Indonesia, get rid of some common bad habits. I've used this course as a component of a 3 week presentation workshop. The presentations this year are so much better than last due to these videos. I tossed aside the other materials because this course's videos outshone them.
Very comprehensive, well structured. I've attended three courses of prof McGarrity and I am an absolute fan if him
Very informative course.Matt McGarity is a very insightful and well-spoken teacher.
L
Useful tools to help boring, data driven presentations come to life and keep your audiences attention.
clear, simple and useful. Its simply great.
An excellent course for those who strive to speak more confidently and professionally.

Awesome course in Public Speaking from Dr. Matt McGarrity and same awesomeness level! This is the second course in this specialization out of four and I am going to finish them all.I recommend this course to everyone regardless you activity, job and lifestyle!
Ottimo corso, necessario per la carriera professionale di qualsiasi persona. Simpatico e molto preparato il professore.
Very informative and well structured course!
